fieldUpdates.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE( FS_Market_Activation_Override_Reasons__c))), '[' + FS_Local_Time__c+ ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Market_Activation_Override_Reason__c + BR() + BR() +PRIORVALUE( FS_Market_Activation_Override_Reasons__c ) + BR(), '[' +FS_Local_Time__c+ ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Market_Activation_Override_Reason__c + BR() )
fieldUpdates.name: Append Market activation override reason

fieldUpdates.description: If anyone else besides Footprint is selected as the Trainer then the OB Status should default to Cancelled when the installation record is created.

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(FS_Closeout_Notes_Comments__c))), '[' + FS_Local_Time__c + ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Closeout_Notes_CommentsTimestamp__c + BR() + BR() +PRIORVALUE(FS_Closeout_Notes_Comments__c) + BR(), '[' + FS_Local_Time__c + ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Closeout_Notes_CommentsTimestamp__c + BR() )

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(FS_Customer_Support_Notes__c))), '[' + FS_Local_Time__c + ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Add_new_Customer_Support_Notes__c + BR() + BR() +PRIORVALUE(FS_Customer_Support_Notes__c) + BR(), '[' + FS_Local_Time__c + ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Add_new_Customer_Support_Notes__c + BR() )
fieldUpdates.name: Update Customer Support Notes

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(FS_Install_Notes_Comments__c))), '[' + FS_Local_Time__c + ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Install_Notes_Comments_Timestamp_Text__c + BR() + BR() +PRIORVALUE(FS_Install_Notes_Comments__c) + BR(), '[' + FS_Local_Time__c + ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Install_Notes_Comments_Timestamp_Text__c + BR() )
fieldUpdates.name: update Install Notes/Comments Timestamp

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(FS_NDO_Notes_Comments__c))), '[' + FS_Local_Time__c+ ' EST, '+ $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_NDO_Notes_CommentsTimestamp__c + BR() + BR() +PRIORVALUE(FS_NDO_Notes_Comments__c) + BR(), '[' + FS_Local_Time__c+ ' EST, ' +$User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_NDO_Notes_CommentsTimestamp__c + BR() )
fieldUpdates.name: Update NDO Notes/Comments

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(FS_Readiness_Notes__c))), '[' +FS_Local_Time__c+ ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Readiness_NotesTimestamp__c + BR() + BR() +PRIORVALUE(FS_Readiness_Notes__c) + BR(), '[' +FS_Local_Time__c+ ' EST, ' + $User.FirstName + ' ' +$User.LastName + ']'+ BR() + FS_Readiness_NotesTimestamp__c + BR() )

rules.fullName: Notify CDM user on platform change
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = 'New Install', OR(PRIORVALUE(Overall_Status2__c)= 'Scheduled', PRIORVALUE(Overall_Status2__c )= 'Pending Reschedule'), ISCHANGED( Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c))

rules.fullName: Notify COM %26 PM Users on PIA Record Creation
Notify COM User on Platform Change

rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISNEW()), RecordType.Name = 'New Install', FS_Order_Delivery_method_check__c, ISCHANGED(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c), OR(PRIORVALUE(Overall_Status2__c)= 'Scheduled', PRIORVALUE(Overall_Status2__c )= 'Pending Reschedule', PRIORVALUE(Overall_Status2__c)= 'Ready for Scheduling') )
